title: FortiOS - Improper verification of the user certificate's chain of trust in FortiGate when connecting to SSL-VPN
summary: An improper following of a certificate's chain of trust vulnerability in FortiGate SSL-VPN may allow an LDAP user to connect to VPN with any certificate that is signed by a trusted Certificate Authority.

nodes.description: FortiOS: greater equal 6.4.2, less equal 6.4.4, fixed in [6.4.5, 7.0.0]
